meanings.definition: Engaging in noisy and boisterous behavior.
meanings.sent1: The roystering group of friends laughed loudly at the party.
meanings.sent2: The children's roystering playtime could be heard throughout the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The roystering puppy chased its tail in circles, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The roystering wind howled through the trees, creating a wild symphony.
meanings.sent5: The roystering thunderstorm shook the windows with its powerful rumbling.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in noisy and boisterous behavior.
meanings.sent1: The roystering man at the bar was the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: The roystering crowd cheered loudly at the sports event.
meanings.sent3: The roystering comedian had the audience in stitches with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The roystering leader rallied the team with his energetic speeches.
meanings.sent5: The roystering child ran around the playground, spreading joy and laughter.
